recipes.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
recipes.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. 2. Add chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and coconut milk. 3. Stir in curry powder and simmer until chickpeas are tender. 4. Serve hot with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. 2. Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot with crusty bread.

recipes.name: Vegan Tofu Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: 1. Press tofu to remove excess water, then dice into cubes. 2. Sauté tofu in sesame oil until golden brown. 3. Add broccoli and bell peppers, cook until tender-crisp. 4. Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, and cornstarch, then add to the pan. 5. Stir until sauce thickens. 6. Serve hot over rice.

recipes.name: Vegan Banana Bread
recipes.instructions: 1. Mash ripe bananas in a bowl. 2. Add flour, sugar, melted coconut oil, baking powder, and vanilla extract. 3. Mix until well combined. 4. Pour into a greased loaf pan. 5. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes. 6. Allow to cool before slicing.

favorites.name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
favorites.instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. 2. Add chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and coconut milk. 3. Stir in curry powder and simmer until chickpeas are tender. 4. Serve hot with rice or naan.

favorites.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

favorites.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
favorites.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

favorites.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
favorites.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

favorites.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
favorites.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

favorites.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
favorites.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. 2. Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot with crusty bread.

favorites.name: Vegan Tofu Stir-Fry
favorites.instructions: 1. Press tofu to remove excess water, then dice into cubes. 2. Sauté tofu in sesame oil until golden brown. 3. Add broccoli and bell peppers, cook until tender-crisp. 4. Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, and cornstarch, then add to the pan. 5. Stir until sauce thickens. 6. Serve hot over rice.

favorites.name: Vegan Banana Bread
favorites.instructions: 1. Mash ripe bananas in a bowl. 2. Add flour, sugar, melted coconut oil, baking powder, and vanilla extract. 3. Mix until well combined. 4. Pour into a greased loaf pan. 5. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes. 6. Allow to cool before slicing.

favorites.name: Vegan Banana Bread
favorites.instructions: 1. Mash ripe bananas in a bowl. 2. Add flour, sugar, melted coconut oil, baking powder, and vanilla extract. 3. Mix until well combined. 4. Pour into a greased loaf pan. 5. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes. 6. Allow to cool before slicing.

favorites.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. 2. Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot with crusty bread.

favorites.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
favorites.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. 2. Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot with crusty bread.

favorites.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
favorites.instructions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. 2. Add rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. 3. Simmer until lentils are tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve hot with crusty bread.

favorites.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
favorites.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil and garlic. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Combine cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

favorites.name: Vegan Tofu Stir-Fry
favorites.instructions: 1. Press tofu to remove excess water, then dice into cubes. 2. Sauté tofu in sesame oil until golden brown. 3. Add broccoli and bell peppers, cook until tender-crisp. 4. Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, and cornstarch, then add to the pan. 5. Stir until sauce thickens. 6. Serve hot over rice.

favorites.name: Vegan Banana Bread
favorites.instructions: 1. Mash ripe bananas in a bowl. 2. Add flour, sugar, melted coconut oil, baking powder, and vanilla extract. 3. Mix until well combined. 4. Pour into a greased loaf pan. 5. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes. 6. Allow to cool before slicing.

favorites.name: Vegan Chickpea Curry
favorites.instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. 2. Add chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and coconut milk. 3. Stir in curry powder and simmer until chickpeas are tender. 4. Serve hot with rice or naan.
